Description:
CALLING ALL STARTERS AND INVESTORS
If you are looking for that perfect first home or keen on adding to your investment portfolio, then this is the way to go. This single level Craigieburn unit is light and inviting, offering the easiest low maintenance opportunity you'll find.
With natural light throughout and an unbeatable convenient location, the floor plan begin with a generous size family living and dining area. There are also 3 great size bedrooms with a central bathroom.
Ideally located right in the heart of Craigieburn within close distance to Craigieburn train station, shopping plaza, school and shops. Don't let this opportunity pass you by. This one won't hang around for long. Call now for inspection....

Description:
BRAND NEW STYLE OF LIVING
Simply turn the key & move straight into this sparkling brand new Porter Davis built family home, with the peace of mind knowing everything has been done for you.
With its instant street appeal, this beautifully designed & spacious home will excite your senses with 4 bedrooms, ensuite with double vanities & walk-in robe to main, fully equipped kitchen with a large walk in pantry, overlooks a spacious open plan living with family & dining room, plus the added bonus of a separate living room, double remote garage with internal access & professionally landscaped gardens front & rear.
Featuring full turn-key inclusions & premium upgrades, including, roller blinds throughout, 900mm stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, stone bench tops, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, LED down lights to entry & living areas, alarm, letterbox, clothesline, fencing & much more.
This amazing package is well located close to Highlands Shopping Centre, Highlands Hotel, local shops & suitable for families with primary school, Newbury Child & Community Centre & beautiful parks with walking tracks all close by. Don't miss out on this sensational offering, call today
Please Note: Private inspections only.
Please contact the selling agent to make an appointment.

Description:
Impressive Family Home with Versatile Style
Premium features, flexible living zones and impeccable presentation highlight the appeal of this modern double-storey home sitting pretty on 448m2 (approx.) allotment.
Located in the highly sought after Mt Aitken Estate delivering an exceptional family lifestyle in a popular Craigieburn neighborhood.
Impressive interior showcases four bedrooms (all with robes) with master en-suite downstairs and other 3 bedrooms with an option for 4th bedroom upstairs, study, stylish en-suite bathroom separate powder room.
Add to this a formal lounge, rumpus/retreat upstairs and modern contemporary separate kitchen, stone benchtops, stainless steel cooking 900 mm appliances and dishwasher. Other highlights of this feature packed home include ducted heating and ducted evaporative cooling, split air condition and full-size laundry plus balcony and a big two car garage. Some of the luxurious features of this property include a well-lit sunroom and second kitchen for a big family, fireplace and lifestyle excellence in a prime family-focused location. Walking distance to public transport, Mt Aitken School, river trails and parkland and Craigieburn shopping center-this family home will tick all the boxes and should be on top of your inspection list, so call now to book a private inspection!
Exceptional Inclusions:
-Solar Panels
-Evaporative cooling
-Ducted heating
-Intercom with cameras
-Butler's pantry
-Sunroom
-Split system
-Fire place
-Ducted vacuum system.
Call us today!
Ricky Singh 0415 167 144
Bhupinder Mata 0433 141 284
*Photo ID Required At All Inspections*

http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Affordable luxury!
FOR A PRIVATE INSPECTION PLEASE CONTACT THE AGENT DIRECTLY this is in order to protect the Community and in line with advice received from the WHO and Australian Government.
A stylish celebration of natural northern light and flowing space, this stunning 2 bedroom entertainer offers family-sized living with additional outdoor appeal.
Set over 2 luxury levels, discover a stone-topped kitchen with island bench and quality stainless-steel appliances, underpinned by roomy open-plan living/dining.
Overlooking lush and leafy parkland, make every social event an occasion and step outdoors on a supersized terrace with room for a BBQ, lounge and dining settings.
* Dual entrance from Grand Boulevard and Ardsley Circuit
* 2 large bedrooms with built-in robes
* Luxurious family bathroom with walk-in shower and separate WC
* Concealed laundry
* Storage under stairs
* Split-system heating and cooling plus roller blinds
* Remote-controlled garage featuring internal access
* Cosy courtyard with garden shed
Moments from Highlands shopping and quality schools with transport and parkland on your doorstep, this north-facing gem will not last long!
For more information, please contact Alex Melnychuk today.

Description:
Family-Sized, Brick Veneer Home!
On good-sized block of approx. 700sqm (approx.), this 4 bedroom, family home has everything you need for a great life!
Situated in a cul-de-sac, the homely floor plan includes; 2 living areas, 4 good-sized bedrooms. Bright, main bedroom with access to bathroom & WIR. Modern, kitchen made for a cook with gas cook top & extra-wide oven. Features loads of natural light throughout and an added bonus is a large dining area. Fantastic, flat backyard with North-Easterly aspect featuring exceptional lock up workshop/shed/bungalow with wood fire place, WC with basin & reverse cycle a/c unit. Additionally there is a double, lock up garage from side drive.
Extra highlights include; 2.5km approx. to train station, gas, central heating, ducted, evaporative cooling + 2 x a/c units & gas log fire place in living room.
Easy access to Hume Hwy and a short drive to Craigieburn Central & golf course.
No need to look any further, this is the one!
Insights: 8 Plymouth Court, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Like living at Craigieburn central
Located in the heart of Craigieburn with all major amenities at your doorstep, this 3-bedroom townhouse offers the perfect place for first home or immediate investment and is the ideal addition to your property portfolio.
With modern styling throughout 3 levels, this immaculate property comprises 2 generous bedrooms on the top level each with built in robes and a central bathroom. Few steps down be soaked by the sun-drenched open plan kitchen/dining and living area followed by a multi-purpose room on the bottom floor perfect for a home office, retreat or 3rd bedroom.
Other features of the home include split system cooling, s/s appliances, laundry, balcony, powder room, single car garage with internal access and much more. Only seconds away to Craigieburn Central, bus routes, Splash Aquatic Centre, Anzac park and all other major amenities. This is the ideal choice for any kind of buyer!
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*

Description:
TRADITIONAL FAMILY HOME ON 660m2 ONLY MINUTES TO TRAIN STATION
More than meets the eye, this home is set to impress with its versatile floorplan, impressive blend of indoor/outdoor living and convenience to all of Craigieburns major amenities.
Perfectly positioned, this home is ideal for first home buyers or the growing family. Situated on an exceptionally large block (660m2 approx.) this well presented home comprises of 3 bedrooms each with BIR, master featuring spacious walk in robe, sun drenched front lounge room with built in bar, well-appointed kitchen with ample cupboard space, generous sized meals/dining area, rumpus room with adjoining recreation area perfect for family gatherings.
Other impressive features include double car port with drive through access perfect place to store boats cars and caravans, 3 x reverse cycle split systems, garden shed, gas cooktop, 2 x wall furnaces, 3 living zones and much more!

Description:
SOLD BY KALLEY SINGH 0433 927 573 & VIJETH SHETTY 0402 407 840. More Listings Wanted!
Imagine the ideal home in a tree-lined neighbourhood. Park front home with amazing views, a place where active green spaces and bike paths unfold from your doorstep and everything you need is within easy reach. A place where living is made simple, and there's more time for simply living.
Spaced modestly across two levels, with floor plans intelligently designed to complement how modern families live, home contains 2 bedrooms, separate living space. Intelligent design and layout ensure your space remains perfectly comfortable and private.
This brand new, low maintenance Townhouse are located in a modern community that already feels like an established neighbourhood in a top location close to parks and lakes.
The ground level at the front is a formal lounge, a central powder room near the stairs and the entrance leading to a bright and well-lit open area including the kitchen, dining and leading to a large backyard and the secure carport with and ample room for a family car.
On the upper level, the property comprises 2 bedrooms of which main with walk-in robe, balcony view, second bedrooms with built-in robes sharing the main central bathroom and separate toilet.
The Craigieburn train station is 6.8km/13 min drive and only 6 min drive to Highlands Shopping centre the destination for entertainment.
Don't miss out this opportunity. Call today for private inspection.
Tannous Kabalan - 0401 619 618 for more information

Description:
Sheer Brilliance, Quality & Perfection!
Showcasing meticulous presentation, designer-inspired finishes & high-end credentials, this showpiece 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom single-level (approx 30sq) family residence is simply breathtaking.
Astutely designed, maximising space, light & functionality, it features sophisticated entry, formal lounge, expansive open plan family space, dining area & vogue kitchen extending onto an all-weather alfresco entertaining deck, set amidst low maintenance landscaped gardens.
Resplendent in top-of-the-range appointments, including 9ft square set ceilings, heightened doors, Westinghouse oven, dishwasher, walk-in- butlers pantry & 40mm Caesarstone waterfall island, the kitchen is truly sublime.
There are 4 stunning bedrooms, 3 present mirrored built-in-robes. An opulent master flaunts custom walk-in-robe & impressive double ensuite featuring dual vanities and an abundance of quality.
Highlights include luxury bathrooms, 6.5 Kw (21 Panel) solar power, zoned ducted heating/refrigerated cooling, alarm/video-intercom, premium carpets, engineered timber floors, excellent storage & automated double garage/in-home access.
You've seen the rest, now experience the best! Built with pride and located to absolute perfection, this needs home needs to be on your MUST SEE LIST!
Please Note: Private inspections only.
Please contact the selling agent to make an appointment.

Space, Style And Sophistication!
Presented with pride, this beautifully crafted home has been built to the highest of standards making it arguably one of the best homes that Craigieburn has on offer. Entertain the masses and feel right at home with a flexible floor plan and glowing interior which comprises of 4 bedrooms, ensuite and WIR to main, sparkling central bathroom, kitchen with stainless steel appliances and wall oven and ample cupboard space, adjoining meals and family area that flows seamlessly through to the oversized undercover alfresco entertaining area perfect for all family gatherings. Complete with oversized large size formal lounge & study, ducted heating and cooling, high ceilings, oversized workshop, garden shed, double car garage, landscaped manicured gardens with & and all this set on a huge parcel of land. One of Craigieburn's most illustrious locations, surrounded by parklands, shops, schools and withing walking distance to Craigieburn Shopping Centre.

Description:
Make yourself at home
Titled and ready to build this impressive corner block measuring 588m2 approx is located in Beautiful Aston Estate with amazing city views. Enjoy a relaxed, healthy lifestyle in a community where people say hello and where neighbors become firm friends at one of the most sought after pocket in Craigieburn and with easy access to Aitken Blvd and close proximity to Craigieburn Central, Craigieburn Plaza, parklands, schools, lots of on-street parking and within close proximity all other major amenities.
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
Cherishable home in a lovely location
Presented FOR SALE and located in the popular Aston Estate of Craigieburn is a perfect home for anyone. A well designed and welcoming floorplan on 512sqm approx of premium real estate is definitely not to be missed.
On entry the spacious formal lounge is ready to greet everyone, Comprising four spacious bedrooms including a master with walk in robe and ensuite, other bedrooms with built-in robes are serviced with a central bathroom and a separate toilet. Carefully considered open plan layout maximises the utility of the area, and creates a home able to meet the needs of a busy and growing family. Double car garage with internal, external access, open plan kitchen with meals and family area. Modern kitchen with 40mm stone bench tops, dishwasher and a walk in pantry. Includes Evaporative Cooling and Ducted heating, Quality appliances of 900mm cooktop, oven and Rangehood. Extras include fully decked alfresco area that is perfect for entertaining all year round and Great size backyard is something special for kids and family.
Close to Elevation secondary college, your children will be able to receive a great education close to school. Not only the journey to the school be short one, it is perfectly located next to the future Aston Village with supermarkets and speciality stores. Close to Craigieburn central, Splash Aqua park and leisure centre, Aston fields, Green Leaves Early learnig centre, walking trails, bike paths.
Call Sunil Gandham 0418 980 846 for private inspections.
Landscaping For Illustrative Purposes Only

Description:
The Pinnacle of Grand Family Living In Aston!
Practically designed, this gorgeous family Metricon ex-display home simply commands your attention. From the moment you walk in, you'll be impressed by the wide entrance & a free-flowing floor plan. Offering Five Bedrooms (All with Walk in Robes), Two oversized Living Areas, chefs kitchen which includes 900ml stainless steel oven, stone benchtops, walk in butler's pantry with stone benches, dishwasher, oversized walk in pantry and the presence of a meals/family area with coonara fire place providing for a great living space for the whole family to enjoy.
Downstairs features the master bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite with double shower and separate toilet, powder room, great size laundry with extra storage and a huge undercover decked entertainment area with perfectly manicured matured landscaped gardens which highlights the home's practicality and functionality for everyday family living.
Upstairs contains an oversized rumpus area, main bathroom which services a further 4 bedrooms all with walk in robes for all of your fashion accessories. Extras include porcelain tiles throughout, heating & refrigerated cooling, alarm system, upstairs storage & double remote-control garage with internal access.
Set in a tree lined street and conveniently located within close proximity to public transport, Craigieburn Central, Childcare facilities, Champion Parade park, Soccer fields, Craigieburn South Secondary School & Aitken Hill Primary School. The Aston estate is located in the heart of Craigieburn and is an easy commute to Melbourne's CBD via the Hume Highway and Tullamarine Freeway. These are just some of the features that will make your future brighter at Aston.

Description:
Eye Catching Brand New Home
LJ Hooker Craigieburn is proud to present 10 Saint Road Craigieburn. Situated in the highly desirable Aston Estate and with an eye catching façade, this brand new modern home showcases quality from start to finish. With everything from A-Z done for you, it is time to sit back relax and enjoy.
This spectacular home showcases an attractive master bedroom with an eye catching ensuite featuring floor to ceiling tiles, double vanity and stone benchtops plus a walk in robe. Also on offer are three further bedrooms with mirrored built in robes serviced by a gleaming central bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles, bathtub and separate toilet.
Stepping further into the home you are greeted with an elegant kitchen showcasing thick stone benchtops, ample cupboard space and stainless steel appliances which overlooks the light filled living and dining area. If keeping the inside kitchen clean is a dream, take advantage of an additional stainless steel cooktop inside the garage.
Outstanding features include remote control garage, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm, intercom, concrete around the home, landscaped gardens, ample storage and much more.
With plenty of amenities still to come to Aston, take advantage of everything existing with Craigieburn Central, Splash, schools, public transport and plenty of parks all a short trip away.
With the First Home Owners Grant available with this property, take advantage to secure this brand new delight.

Description:
Sensational New Style with Every Aston Advantage
Exceptional modern living, this just-completed home showcases 2 levels of luxury & light providing a ready-to-enjoy family lifestyle opportunity in a sought-after Aston neighbourhood.
The feature-packed 27sq* interior boasts 4 bedrooms, 2 master suites with one conveniently placed downstairs, both featuring WIR's and luxurious ensuites, stylish main bathroom & 2 separate powder rooms- one on each level. Add to this, dual living zones, a spacious open-plan living/dining area accompanied by a classy stone-topped kitchen with soft- close cabinetry, 900mm stainless steel appliances & ample storage space.
Other highlights include a balcony with sensational neighbourhood views, zoned ducted heating/refrigerated cooling, alarm & video intercom, floor-to-ceiling tiles in all bathrooms and powder rooms, 4 toilets, stone benchtops throughout (including the laundry), plus low maintenance surrounds, courtyard with lawn & a remote-control double garage.
This remarkable property also enjoys close proximity to the area's renowned schools, a short stroll to a beautiful park and bus stop, minutes away from Craigieburn Central, as well as easy access to Craigieburn Road & Mickleham Road. Simply move in & start living!

Description:
Simply Stunning!
Enjoy a flexible family lifestyle in this charming, brand new four bedroom brick veneer home, that is designed to ensure harmonious family living. Features include abundant natural light, tiles on wet areas and floorboards throughout. Your spacious lounge flows into the kitchen, meals and family area boasting sliding glass door access to the rear courtyard and garden. The neat kitchen includes a Walk in Pantry, stainless steel appliances, four burner gas cook top, tiled splashback, expansive cupboards, deep drawers, and plenty of bench space. All four double bedrooms are bright including the master bedroom that offers an ensuite including shower, toilet and vanity space. The main bathroom provides a bath, separate shower and vanity. There is a convenient separate toilet and the roomy laundry provides storage cupboards. Extras include gas ducted heating, split system in living area and a spacious drive way. The free flowing spaces of this contemporary home offer the ideal requirements for a modern family.
Be sure to inspect this spectacular home, as It won't be on the market for long!
Insights: 6 Wollemia Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Luxury, Location, Lifestyle - A Complete Family Home
Spacious in design with all modern-day finishes, this 4 bedroom home commands your attention.
Comprising of 4 fitted bedrooms (2 Master with WIR & Ensuite). The third and fourth bedroom with walk in robe and three fully serviced bathrooms.
Spacious open-plan family/dining area complemented by a Cesar stone-bench kitchen complete stainless steel cooking appliances and dishwasher, an abundance of bench space, impressive walk in pantry and roomy laundry with plenty of storage. Alfresco entertaining with 2nd kitchen, rear landscaped yard to entertain family and friends while the kids play to their heart's content in the safety of their own private space.
High ceilings and doors throughout, ducted heating & refrigerated cooling, alarm system,, remote-control double garage with internal access and so much more. Ideally located close to Highland Shopping Centre complex, public transport, popular primary & secondary schools.
This is quite simply THE ONE that you have been looking for. Please feel free to contact Nada Hanna on 0404 804 542
Photo ID required for an Inspection.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.
Insights: 49 Kangaroo Road, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
STUNNING EX-DISPLAY IN BLUE-CHIP LOCATION
A lifestyle of complete luxury, comfort and convenience is assured to the lucky buyer of this stunning Henley ex-display home. Boasting a simple yet practical floor plan, this well-designed home boasts a smooth integration between the stunning kitchen domain through to family meals area and enclosed decked alfresco entertaining area to give the home a free-flowing feel and provide the very best in family entertaining.
A flexible sun-drenched floor plan offering 4 massive bedrooms, huge walk-in robe & deluxe ensuite to a large master bedroom, spacious dual living zones with separate formal lounge, super-sized meals & family area perfect for large scale family gatherings, fully equipped kitchen with great storage, 900mm stainless steel appliances & ample Ceasar stone bench space.
Step outside and be pleasantly surprised by the homes showpiece entertainers alfresco deck which effortlessly links up to the home to provide the ultimate in indoor & outdoor integration. It also provides a safe low maintenance haven for kids to play until their heart's content in complete privacy.
Loaded with high end features, including ducted heating/refrigerative cooling, plantation shutters, stunning spotted gum hardwood floors, motorized security shutters throughout, and so much more!
Insights: 5 Langford Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.
